title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 208.29 - Traverse hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 208.29 - Traverse hearings

State Regulations

Whenever the court has scheduled a hearing to
determine whether process was served validly and timely upon a party, and where
a process server will testify as to the service, the process server shall be
required to bring to the hearing all records in the possession of the process
server relating to the matter at issue. Where the process server is licensed, he or she also shall bring the license to the court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
208.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
